description: Assigns one or more tags (key-value pairs) to the specified resource.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource that you want to tag.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: A map of the key-value pairs of the tag or tags to assign to the resource. (dict) --- The key or keys of the key-value pairs for the tag or tags assigned to a resource. Tag key. Tag value.
